title: 2000년 People v. Di Tillio 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: People v. Di Tillio. 판결일: 2000-11-13. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: The People of the State of New York v. Alphonso Di Tillio
**판결일**: 2000-11-13
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 277 A.D.2d 929
- 715 N.Y.S.2d 683

## 판결문 요약


—Appeal from judgment insofar as it imposed sentence unanimously dismissed (see, People v Haywood, 203 AD2d 966, Iv denied 83 NY2d 967) and judgment affirmed. (Appeal from Judgment of Niagara County Court, Broderick, J. — Assault, 2nd Degree.) Present — Pigott, Jr., P. J., Wisner, Kehoe and Balio, JJ.
...
